availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Marion County, Kentucky, merchant. Kentucky native. Married to Ann T. Graves Wathen. Father of Ann L. Wathen, Mary J. Wathen, John B. Wathen, and William E. Wathen.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marion County, Lebanon District 1, p. 36. Charles Kerr, ed., History of Kentucky, Vol. 5 (American Historical Society, 1922), 441. E. Polk Johnson, A History of Kentucky and Kentuckians: The Leaders and Representative Men in Commerce, Industry and Modern Activities, Vol. III (New York: Lewis), 1238.
